```py
# Note: the two following syntaxes are equivalent
# 1: Using transform as a class decorator
@hk.transform
def encoder(x):
  ...
  return model(x) 

encoder.init(...)
encoder.apply(...)

# 2: Applying transfom separately
def encoder(x):
  ...
  return model(x)

encoder_fn = hk.transform(encoder)
encoder_fn.init(...)
encoder_fn.apply(...)
```
